name: .DVD File Extension
summary: Learn about .DVD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Driver for devices used with MS-DOS; enables communication between the operating system and the hardware device; may be preinstalled with Windows or may need to be installed from a disc that comes with the hardware.

content: Files ending with ".DVD" are not DVD movies -- see .VOB instead.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
